00056 /* Period parameters */  
00057 #define CMATH_N 624
00058 #define CMATH_M 397
00059 #define CMATH_MATRIX_A 0x9908b0df   /* constant vector a */
00060 #define CMATH_UPPER_MASK 0x80000000 /* most significant w-r bits */
00061 #define CMATH_LOWER_MASK 0x7fffffff /* least significant r bits */
00062 
00063 /* Tempering parameters */   
00064 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_MASK_B 0x9d2c5680
00065 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_MASK_C 0xefc60000
00066 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_SHIFT_U(y)  (y >> 11)
00067 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_SHIFT_S(y)  (y << 7)
00068 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_SHIFT_T(y)  (y << 15)
00069 #define CMATH_TEMPERING_SHIFT_L(y)  (y >> 18)
00070 
00071 class CRandom
00072 {
00073 private:
00074         // DATA
00075         unsigned int            rseed;
00076         unsigned int            rseed_sp;
00077         unsigned long mt[CMATH_N]; /* the array for the state vector  */
00078         int mti; /* mti==N+1 means mt[N] is not initialized */
00079 
00080         // FUNCTIONS
00081 public:
00082         CRandom(void);  
00083 
00084         unsigned int    Random( unsigned int n );
00085         float                   Random( );
00086         void                    SetRandomSeed(unsigned int n);
00087         unsigned int    GetRandomSeed(void);
00088         void                    Randomize(void);
00089 };

00093 struct Point
00094 {
00095         int x, y;
00096         Point() { x = y = 0; }
00097         Point(int _x, int _y) { x = _x; y = _y; }
00098 };
00099 
00100 typedef std::vector<Point> Poly;

00103 class CMath
00104 {
00105         // DATA
00106 private:
00107         static const unsigned short angle_to_sin[90];
00108 
00109 public:
00110         static CRandom          random;
00111 
00112         // FUNCTIONS
00113 public:
00114         static int                              Cos(short angle, int length);
00115         static int                              Sin(short angle, int length);
00116         static unsigned int             Sqrt( unsigned int n );
00117         static void                             InterpolateLine(int *x, int *y, int end_x, int end_y, int step_size);
00118         static unsigned short   GetAngle(int x, int y);
00119         static bool PointInPoly( Point const &test, const Poly & polygon);
00120         static bool                             PointInPoly
00121                                                         (
00122                                                                 int const                       x,
00123                                                                 int const                       y,
00124                                                                 int const * const       vertex,
00125                                                                 int const                       nvertex
00126                                                         );
00127         static RECT                             BoundingBox
00128                                                         ( 
00129                                                                 const POINT &pt1,
00130                                                                 const POINT &pt2,
00131                                                                 const POINT &pt3,
00132                                                                 const POINT &pt4
00133                                                         );
00134         static RECT                             BoundingBox
00135                                                         (
00136                                                                 const POINT *verts,
00137                                                                 const unsigned int nverts
00138                                                         );
00139         static float const              GetDistanceBetween(POINT const & pt1, POINT const & pt2);
00140 
00141         // Used to determine the bounding box for a range of point-like objects.
00142         // This includes POINTS, CPoints, and VertexUV to name a few.
00143         // This works on any range which includes all STL containers as well as C style arrays.
00144         // See BoundingBox(const POINT*, const unsigned int) in cpp for example usage.
00145         template <typename PointType>
00146         class BoundingBoxFinder : std::unary_function<PointType, void>
00147         {
00148         public:
00149                 void operator()(PointType const & item)
00150                 {
00151                         if (mBoundingBox.invalid())
00152                         {
00153                                 RECT initialValue = { item.x, item.y, item.x, item.y };
00154                                 mBoundingBox = initialValue;
00155                         }
00156                         else
00157                         {
00158                                 mBoundingBox->left = min(mBoundingBox->left, item.x);
00159                                 mBoundingBox->top = min(mBoundingBox->top, item.y);
00160                                 mBoundingBox->right = max(mBoundingBox->right, item.x);
00161                                 mBoundingBox->bottom = max(mBoundingBox->bottom, item.y);
00162                         }
00163                 }
00164 
00165                 RECT const & BoundingBox() { return *mBoundingBox; }
00166 
00167         private:
00168                 optional<RECT> mBoundingBox;
00169         };
00170 
00171 
00172 };

00178 struct LineSegment

00182         LineSegment() { m_begin = m_end = CPoint(0,0); }
00183 };
